name: Lowell George
description: '''Lowell Thomas George''' (April 13, 1945 â€“ June 29, 1979) was an American singer, songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, and record producer. He was the primary guitarist, vocalist, and songwriter for the rock band [[Little Feat]]. Before forming Little Feat, he was a member of [[Frank Zappa]]'s band [[the Mothers of Invention]].
